show_name: Eiga Suite Precure: Torimodose! Kokoro ga Tsunagu Kiseki no Melody (movie)
other_title: Suite PreCure: Take it back! The Miraculous Melody that Connects Hearts!
映画 スイートプリキュア♪とりもどせ！心がつなぐ奇跡のメロディ♪ (Japanese)
plot: Ako and her father are about to return to their homeland when they discover that Queen Aphrodite has made music disappear from their country. It's up to the four Pretty Cure to find out why this is happening and save the magical music land.
opening_theme: "Ra Ra Ra Suite Precure ~UNLIMITED ver.~" by Kudou Mayu
